snippet: Gov. Andrew Cuomo’s proposal to decriminalize public possession of small amounts of marijuana is sound and has wide support from law enforcement. The State Senate majority leader should drop his opposition.
abstract: Editorial urges New York State Senate majority leader Dean Skelos to drop his ill-considered opposition to Gov Andrew Cuomo's sound proposal to decriminalize public possession of small amounts of marijuana.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew Cuomo’s proposal to decriminalize public possession of small amounts of marijuana is sound and has wide support from law enforcement. The State Senate majority leader should drop his opposition.
